reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made with a feminine design and comfortable fit that provides lots of room. They appreciate its warmth, with one noting it's ideal for chilly/drafty places, and many consider it worth the price. The color receives mixed feedback, with some loving it while others note the colors differ from the photos. Several customers mention the size runs very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional!
items.body: This is a gorgeous sweater. Stunningly beautiful, high quality. It fit me true to my size. I’m 5’6” 127lbs and I bought the Small. It looks even better than on the picture. Attention to detail is so unique. I love the velvet lining along the zipper and collar. I love everything about this product. And it arrived real fast too. Definitely worth the money! Read more
items.author: Shirls

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and crafted.
items.body: Purchased for my significant other. She absolutely loves it, due mainly to materials, craft and design. Says it is very warm and every time she wears the sweater gets compliments on it. Read more
items.author: Thomas Kerr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater
items.body: This sweater is so gorgeous. My daughter is size small, about 5'6', 120#, and it fit like a glove. Probably should have bought a Medium as she can't wear anything under it (but she won't take it off!). The wrists have a rounded metal button on them with a zirconium? diamond in it; the quarter zip zipper has a metal heart for the zipper, so utterly gorgeous. The quality is just outstanding. I really want one for myself but I blew the budget getting it for my daughter. Her boyfriend saw it and wanted one too! You will not be disappointed, it will be treasured. Just don't dry it as you'll shrink it! Read more
items.author: MaryT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater!
items.body: I have been wanting a Norway sweater for so long so this year I decided to splurge a little. What a lovely treat. The sweater is absolutely beautiful and fits perfectly, very flattering. Size,,,,,I am usually between a medium and a large (8-10 in numbers) I am 5' 6" and about 165 lbs. , depending on the brand and how I want it to fit. Based on the other reviews, I ordered the large. Perfect. Just enough room in the sleeves so you are not struggling to get it on or off. Gently tapered at the waist and falls at the lower hip level. I could wear a thin layer underneath such as a camisole or turtleneck base layer. It does not look boxy. Fantastic with jeans or black leggings and boots. With respect to the seller, I was missing a small item in the order. I called and they could not have been nicer. Order was immediately rectified. Will order from them again, maybe even treat myself to another color in the future ;) Read more
items.author: Vicki H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality
items.body: Beautiful sweater and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Therese Stack

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is gorgeous!
items.body: This sweater is very well made and a lovely design. Very pretty and attractive. I am concerned that the size is too small, but will probably keep it anyway. Read more
items.author: JP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
items.body: I got the dark blue and light blue one. There is everything to love about this sweater! It took a while to get here, but it was so worth it! Excellent quality, customer service... They even sent a card and a chocolate from over there! It fits me very well, I can even wear layers under it. The colors are exactly as pictured. Also, its very warm, very high quality. Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY!!! TERRIBLE KNITTING ON THE INSIDE!!! NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!
items.body: I wore a Neve sweater for 11 years, and it was time to buy a new one. Ordered one from Neve for $150 or so, what came was not 100% wool, but synthetics. And the website never mentioned it! More than that, it did not allow to leave a review. So I do some research and find this other manufacturer of Scandinavian sweaters, Dale of Norway. 100% wool, seems thick enough - just what I was looking for. Now look on the inside of the sweater (pic attached). Terrible knitting. I don't have long nails, but even my fingers, a watch knob and anything else gets entangled in the threading risking to tear it. The same with my trouser buttons. I can't say how many times threads have been pulled by them! And if one thread gets torn, there is no remedying it. As a side note, I am VERY careful with all my things and clothing... Now my mother and her best friend, who know a thing or two about knitting, are looking into ways to mend the inside. But it will be hard work and for what? Because I paid close to $400 total, taxes and all?... DO NOT BUY!!! Read more
items.author: Belle_etrangere

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Off White, Warm Taupe/Off White, Red Rose/Off White, Ice Blue/Off White, Navy/Ice Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
